entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 01:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of light snow overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
